name: chevereto
tagline: A self-hosted image hosting platform with galleries and sharing features
description: Chevereto is a powerful self-hosted image hosting script that allows drag-and-drop uploads, galleries, albums, and image sharing. It supports multi-user mode, themes, and APIs, and offers both open and paid editions.

features.title: Self-Hosted
features.description: Powerful self-hosted image hosting platform. Complete solution

features.title: File Upload
features.description: Easy upload with drag-and-drop interface. Effortless sharing

features.title: Albums & Galleries
features.description: Organize images in albums and galleries. Beautiful presentation

features.title: Team Collaboration
features.description: Support for multiple users with permissions. Shared hosting

features.title: Theme Customization
features.description: Customizable appearance with theme support. Branded experience
